name: Spicy Chicken Curry
description: A delicious and aromatic chicken curry with a blend of exotic spices. Served with jasmine rice and fresh cilantro.

name: Classic Beef Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce, served in a brioche bun.

name: Vegan Pasta
description: A delightful pasta dish with a creamy cashew sauce, roasted vegetables, and fresh basil.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
